```{r}
prem_modeling <- fifa17_modeling %>% 
  bind_rows(fifa18_modeling, fifa19_modeling) %>% 
  mutate(revision = as.factor(revision), Nation = as.factor(Nation))
```

```{r}
prem_modeling %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(),
               names_to = "variable", 
               values_to = "value") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) +
  facet_wrap(vars(variable), 
             scales = "free")
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
prem_modeling_outfield <- prem_modeling %>% 
  filter(position != "GK") %>% 
  #filter(position %in% c("ST", "LW", "RW", "CF", "CAM")) %>% 
  filter(minutes_played_divided_by90 >= 19) %>% 
  mutate(position = ifelse(position == "RWB", "RB", ifelse(position == "LWB", "LB", position))) %>% 
  select(-Goals_allowed, -GA90, -SoTA, -Saves, -Save_percent, -W, -L, -D, -CS, -CS_percent, -Pkatt_against, -PKA, -PKsv, -Pk_Save_percent, -PKm)
```


```{r}
set.seed(494)
prem_split <- initial_split(prem_modeling_outfield, prop = .75, strata = "revision")
prem_training <- training(prem_split)
prem_testing <- testing(prem_split)
```



```{r}
prem_lasso_recipe <- recipe(revision ~ . , data = prem_training) %>% 
  step_rm(Player, Nation, Squad, Born, Min, MP, G_per90, A_per90, Non_PK_G, G_plus_A_per90, G_minus_Pk_per90, G_plus_A_minus_PK_per90) %>%
  step_upsample(revision, over_ratio = .3) %>% 
  step_normalize(all_predictors(),
                 -all_nominal()) %>% 
  step_dummy(all_nominal(),
             -all_outcomes())

prem_lasso_recipe %>% 
  prep(prem_training) %>% 
  juice()
```



```{r}
prem_lasso <- logistic_reg(mixture = 1) %>% 
  set_engine("glmnet") %>% 
  set_args(penalty = tune()) %>% 
  set_mode("classification")

prem_lasso

prem_lasso_wf <- 
  workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(prem_lasso_recipe) %>% 
  add_model(prem_lasso)

prem_lasso_wf
```

```{r}
set.seed(494) # for reproducibility
prem_cv <- vfold_cv(prem_training, v = 5)

penalty_grid <- grid_regular(penalty(),
                             levels = 10)

penalty_grid

prem_lasso_tune <- 
  prem_lasso_wf %>% 
  tune_grid(
    resamples = prem_cv,
    grid = penalty_grid
    )

prem_lasso_tune
```

```{r}
prem_lasso_tune %>% 
  show_best(metric = "accuracy")
```

```{r}

best <- prem_lasso_tune %>% 
  select_best(metric = "accuracy")
```

```{r}
prem_lasso_final_wf <- prem_lasso_wf %>% 
  finalize_workflow(best)

prem_lasso_final_wf
```
```{r}
prem_lasso_final_mod <- prem_lasso_final_wf %>% 
  fit(data = prem_training)

prem_lasso_final_mod %>% 
  pull_workflow_fit() %>% 
  tidy() 
```

```{r}
prem_lasso_final_mod %>% 
  pull_workflow_fit() %>% 
  vip()
```


```{r}
prem_lasso_test <- prem_lasso_final_wf %>% 
  last_fit(prem_split)

prem_lasso_test %>% 
  collect_metrics()
```


```{r}
preds <- prem_lasso_test %>% 
  collect_predictions()

preds %>% 
  conf_mat(revision, .pred_class)
```


```{r}
lasso_test <- prem_testing %>% 
  bind_cols(predict(prem_lasso_final_mod, new_data = prem_testing, type = "prob")) %>% 
  bind_cols(predict(prem_lasso_final_mod, new_data = prem_testing)) 
```

```{r}
lasso_test %>% 
  conf_mat(revision, .pred_class)
```

```{r}
lasso_test %>% 
  filter(revision != .pred_class)
```


```{r}
ranger_recipe <- recipe(revision ~., data = prem_training) %>% 
  step_rm(Player, Squad, Born, Nation) %>% 
  step_upsample(revision, over_ratio = .3) %>% 
  step_mutate_at(all_numeric(), fn = ~as.numeric(.))

ranger_recipe %>% 
  prep(prem_training) %>% 
  juice()
```


```{r}
prem_ranger <- rand_forest(mtry = tune(), 
              min_n = tune(), 
              trees = 100) %>% 
  set_mode("classification") %>% 
  set_engine("ranger")

prem_ranger_wf <- 
  workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(ranger_recipe) %>% 
  add_model(prem_ranger) 

prem_ranger_wf
```


```{r}
set.seed(494)

rf_grid <- grid_regular(min_n(), finalize(mtry(), prem_training %>% select(-revision)), levels = 3)

ctrl_res <- control_stack_grid()

ranger_cv <- prem_ranger_wf %>% 
  tune_grid(resamples = prem_cv,
           grid = rf_grid,
           control = ctrl_res)

collect_metrics(ranger_cv)
```


```{r}
best1 <- ranger_cv %>% 
  select_best(metric = "accuracy")

prem_ranger_final_wf<- prem_ranger_wf %>% 
  finalize_workflow(best1)
```

```{r}
ranger_fit <- prem_ranger_final_wf %>% 
  fit(prem_training)


rf_explain <- 
  explain_tidymodels(
    model = ranger_fit,
    data = prem_training %>% select(-revision), 
    y = as.numeric(prem_training$revision == "TOTS"),
    label = "rf"
  )
```

```{r}
rf_var_imp <- 
  model_parts(
    rf_explain
    )

plot(rf_var_imp)
```
